mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email, u.date_of_birth, u.gender, u.address, u.phone, u.role_id, u.created_at, u.updated_at FROM users u LEFT JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE r.id IS NULL
SELECT r.id AS roleId, r.name AS roleName, COUNT(u.id) AS userCount FROM roles r LEFT JOIN users u ON u.role_id = r.id GROUP BY r.id, r.name ORDER BY r.id;
